name: Violet Blue Cut
description: Expertly crafted, the Ash Violet Blue Cut Lens offers superior eye protection with a stylish edge. Designed for comfort and clarity, this premium lens effectively filters harmful blue light, reducing strain for prolonged screen use. Available exclusively at Spectra Optical, this high-quality lens delivers unmatched value at its price—offering precision, durability, and elegance you won’t find elsewhere.

name: LD02 LOUNGE CHAIR
description: Expertly rendered by Carl Hansen & Søn, the lounge chair—first introduced in 1951 and enduring ever since—is available in oak or as a combination of oak and walnut, sourced from sustainable forestry. Choose from seat and back upholstery in a selection of leather options or in a custom fabric.

name: Hard Coat
description: Designed for durability and clarity, the Durato Hard Coat Lens features an ultra-resistant coating that protects against scratches and wear. Its high-transparency surface ensures a crisp, distortion-free vision, making it a reliable everyday choice.
